revised_title: External Coherence of Pokot Ritual Behavior and its Impact on Community and Courtship
tldr: This study examines the external coherence of Pokot ritual behavior in East Africa, focusing on the connection between the Nkula ceremony, the nature of the Pokot community, and patterns of courtship and marriage. The author highlights how the ritual behavior helps define the Pokot community and how it mitigates some of the challenges faced in courtship and marriage.
